text: Mu sa de zuren zai ta likai shi, yong tamen de zhuangshi pin zhuzaole yige neng fachu niu jiao sheng de niudu de quti [gong chongbai]. Nandao tamen bu mingbai na niudu ji buneng tong tamen jianghua, ye buneng yindao tamen zhengdao ma? Tamen ba na niudu dang shen [chongbai], tamen shi bu yi zhe.
